# Highlights {-}
* A suite of useful microelements revealed in starry sturgeon fin spines 
* Sturgeon spine microchemistry differs significantly in north and south Caspian Sea
* Microchemistry suggests regional environmental and physiological differences
* Life-history differences imply unique sturgeon stocks; require management actions
* Fin-spine microchemistry can non-lethally discriminate sturgeon stocks
